name: influxdbSetLogging
shortDescription: Enables logging of values for a specific variable in InfluxDB
description: This method enables logging for a specific device or system variable in InfluxDB. It is only available, when Homegear InfluxDB is installed and running.
signatures: Void influxdbSetLogging(Integer peerId, Integer channel, Integer variable, Variant initialValue, Boolean enableLogging)

parameters.name: peerId
parameters.description: The ID of the peer containing the variable to log. For system variables use 0.

parameters.name: channel
parameters.description: The channel containing the variable to log. For metadata use -1.

parameters.name: initialValue
parameters.description: Mandatory when enableLogging is true. Ignored when it is false. The initial value to write into the database. You can for example pass the output of getValue. initialValue is used to determine the type of the variable.

parameters.name: enableLogging
parameters.description: true enables logging of variable value changes, false disables it and deletes all previously logged entries from the database.

errors.description: InfluxDB error. The error struct contains a descriptive error message.
